page.title: 16BADLUARACH-MEDICAL SERVICES
page.content: DESPITE THE RELATIVE ISOLATION THIS AREA IS WELL SERVED BY A MEDICAL TEAM OF DISTRICT NURSE AND DOCTORS.THE BASE OF THE NURSE IS DURNAMUCK,2Km TO THE EAST OF BADLUARACH,ALTHOUGH SHE LIVES JUST OUTSIDE THE AREA.SHE IS A "TRIPLE DUTY" NURSE,BEING DISTRICT NURSE,MID- WIFE AND HEALTH VISITOR.HER RELIEF NURSE LIVES AT BADRALLACH,ON THE NORTH SIDE OF LITTLE LOCH BROOM.BAD WEATHER NEVER PREVENTS HER REACHING BADLUARACH BUT WINTER GALES CAN MAKE THE CROSSING TO SCORAIG DIFFICULT AND OCCASIONALLY IMPOSSIBLE. BADLUARACH PEOPLE ARE SERVED BY THE THREE-DOCTOR TEAM OF GENERAL PRACTITIONERS IN ULLAPOOL.A WEEKLY SURGERY IS HELD AT THE NURSE'S HOUSE AND VISITS ARE MADE TO PATIENTS IN THE AREA ON THAT DAY,OR MORE OFTEN WHEN NECESSARY.FOR MORE SERIOUS COMPLAINTS PATIENTS ATTEND RAIGMORE HOSPITAL.
